plugins.name: Frame Toggler
plugins.description: Problem : When presenting a solution, explaining the main workflow while showcasing multiple design options for each page can clutter the view. Solution : Use this tool to collapse alternative pages in the main workflow, displaying only the first option initially. After presenting the main flow, click a toggle button to expand all pages for detailed discussions

plugins.name: Stockpress
plugins.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
plugins.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs

For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
136760.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

plugins.name: Side note
plugins.description:
Meet Side Note, your minimalist companion for organizing thoughts, ideas, and to-dos in style. Side Note is designed for simplicity, focus, and seamless integration with your creative workflow. Whether you're jotting down quick ideas or capturing important notes, Side Note keeps everything neat and accessible.


Key Features:


  1. Customizable Notes: Add titles, content, and importance labels to make each note unique.
  2. Smart Sizing: Flexible vertical layouts with precise padding for a polished design.
  3. Intuitive Interface: Clean, modern UI for a distraction-free note-taking experience.
  4. Important Labeling: Highlight key notes with an elegant "Important" tag for quick prioritization.
  5. Effortless Integration: Built for seamless use within Figma, perfect for designers on the go.
plugins.tagline: Quick Notes, Seamless Workflow.

plugins.name: Pancake Work
plugins.description:
Guideline (Vietnamese):

  1. Plugin giúp link figma design vào một issue của Pancake Work
  2. Các bước thực hiện:


  1. Vào Pancake Work copy link issue
  2. Chọn node cần gắn link, chú ý đánh dấu ready for dev cho node đó trước (nếu cần) (node nên là frame/section)
  3. Mở plugin Pancake Work, paste link issue vào ô đầu tiên (Plugin có lưu lại link với mỗi node)
  4. Click vào ô thứ 2, nhấn Cmd + L (với Mac), hoặc Ctrl + L (với Windows) để lấy link figma, rồi paste
  5. Nhấn Create/Update


Roadmap:

  1. Update English guideline
  2. Listen feedback from Pancake designers to improve
  3. Maybe link for Kanban
  4. Hmmm, I don't know...


Copyright 2024 Pancake
plugins.tagline: Link Figma designs to Pancake Work

Roadmap:

  4. Hmmm, I don't know...


Copyright 2024 Pancake

plugins.name: Toggle Visibility By Type
plugins.description:
Toggle Visibility by Type is designed to streamline your design workflow by allowing you to quickly toggle the visibility of selected layers based on their type.

Whether you’re working with 🖼️ images, 📝 text, 🔲 shapes, 🔗 paths, ↔️ lines, 📁 groups, or 📐 frames, this plugin provides an intuitive interface to control which elements are visible in your design. Simply select the layers or groups you want to modify, choose the layer type you want to toggle, and hit the ☑️ button.


This plugin is especially useful for managing complex designs and improving your efficiency in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Quickly toggle visibility of selected layers by type!

99518.tagline: Quickly toggle visibility of selected layers by type!

plugins.name: ex-portable
plugins.description:
Ex-portable is a super simple plug-in for Figma that allows you to pull export settings from a main component in a library to an instance. That’s all.


Get settings for selected instances

Select the instances you want to apply the export settings from a main component in a library for, and select this command.


Get settings for all instances

Got a lot of instances on your page? Select this command to apply export settings from their main components.
plugins.tagline: Port your export settings from component to instance.

plugins.name: Easily Name output
plugins.description:
Step 1: Export Name Mapping


Prefix the node name with "▼". For example: "▼page-template".

Enter the Google Sheet URL in the first input field or click the file button to select a file.

The number of nodes must match the number of rows in the uploaded document (excluding the title).

The name mapping should be in the first column, with the column header named "Name".

Specify the corresponding sheet name.

If an XLSX file is selected, the first sheet will be prefilled.

Step 2: Export


Select the nodes to be exported.

If none are selected, all nodes on the current page starting with "▼" will be exported.

Choose the export format (PDF/PNG/JPG/SVG).
plugins.tagline: Replace Export Names for Figma Frame Types

plugins.name: Tailwind Text Styles Generator
plugins.description:
Tailwind Text Style Generator is a Figma plugin that helps you automatically generate text styles from Google Fonts, based on Tailwind typography scale.


Tired of manually creating text styles and organizing layers one by one? This plugin does it all for you:


🎨 Choose from 1,800+ Google Fonts

📏 Auto-generate Text Styles using Tailwind-friendly sizing (sm, base, lg, xl, etc.)

⚡ Perfect for dev-design alignment especially for teams using Tailwind CSS

📁 Organized neatly: styles are grouped and named by scale

🔁 Try different fonts freely great for experimenting and iterating

💾 Instantly saved into your current design system


Whether you're building a design system or just want to speed up your workflow, this plugin makes it seamless, scalable, and developer-friendly.
plugins.tagline: 1.800 Fonts. 1 Click. Done.

plugins.name: Alt Text Generator
plugins.description:
Overview

Generate alt text for images using AI. Improve SEO and accessibility for your websites and rank higher on Google.


Benefits

Automatic: Alt text is automatically added to every image on the site using bulk feature.


Free Credits: Get 5 free credits upon sign up.


Extensive Image Support: Supports the following image types: JPEG, JPG, PNG, GIF, and WEBP.


SEO and Accessibility: Alt text generated is highly optimized to rank higher and improve SEO.


Features

Generate alt text using AI - Use AI to automatically generate alt text for your images.


Bulk generate - Automatically detects all images on site editor and adds alt text.


How It Works

Open plugin.


Get a free API key from https://alttextgeneratorai.com/dashboard


(5 free credits upon sign up)


Start generating alt text for free.


Done!


Credits

The plugin works based on credits. You get 5 free credits upon sign up. If you need to recharge credits, you can visit our pricing page.


Pricing

We don't like monthly plans, so all of our plans are one-time payment plans and affordable to all users.

plugins.name: Link Spacing & Radius Variables (Alpha)
plugins.description:
One-click application of variables to selected objects


Important: Variable Requirements

1. Variables must be in an external library (local variables are not supported yet)

2. The library must be connected to your file


Variable Naming Requirements:

For Spacing:

- Format: `space-{number}`

- Examples: `space-4`, `space-8`, `space-16`, `space-24`

- Variable value must match the number in the name

For Radius:

- Format: `radius-{number}`

- Examples: `radius-4`, `radius-8`, `radius-16`

- Variable value must match the number in the name


Collection Requirements:

- Spacing collection must include the word "spacing" in its name

- Radius collection must include the word "radius" or "border-radius" in its name


How to Prepare Your File

1. Connect the variable library:

- Open "Team Library" menu

- Find the required library

- Enable the toggle next to the "Variables" section

2. Ensure objects are prepared:

- For spacing: objects must use Auto Layout

- For radius: objects must support the cornerRadius property


How to Use

1. Select objects you want to apply variables to

2. Launch the plugin

3. Choose the desired collection from the dropdown (marked with 📚 icon)

4. Click "Apply spacing" or "Apply radius"
plugins.tagline: Link spacing and radius variables

plugins.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
plugins.description:
Description

Structura revolutionizes how you manage API, design, and copy documentation. With an all-in-one platform, gain clarity on workflows, discover the exact APIs and components used, and ensure precise copies across your designs.


How To?

  1. Run this plugin into your figma files
  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
plugins.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

plugins.name: Hive
plugins.description:
Tired of endless swiping, cluttered frames, and struggling to stay focused?

Say hello to Hive, the ultimate Figma plugin designed to transform your design process. With its minimalist approach and powerful features, Hive ensures a smoother, more organized, and efficient workflow for designers and teams alike. Perfect for those working on complex projects with multiple screens and teams presenting designs or collaborating on organized workspaces.


Key Features

🗂 Create Categories: Group frames into organized categories for a streamlined workflow.

🔍 Zoom-In Functionality: Quickly focus on specific categories, making navigation seamless.

🎯 Smooth Screen Presentation: Eliminate the frustration of moving around messy frames while presenting. Hive ensures a clean, irritation-free presentation experience.

⚡ Simplified Workflow: Minimalist, easy-to-use interface that saves time and effort.

🔄 Quick Frame Switching: Easily switch between frames without excessive swiping, allowing for a faster and more efficient workflow as you move through different tasks.


Why This Plugin?

When working on large design files, scrolling endlessly, searching for frames, or jumping between screens during team presentations can be chaotic and jarring to the eye. Hive eliminates the frustration by organizing frames into clear categories and enabling zoom-in functionality. Whether you're working alone or presenting designs to your team, Hive keeps your workspace smooth, clean, and irritation-free.

🚀 Boost Productivity: Spend less time navigating and more time designing.

🗂️ Stay Organized: Keep your navigation intuitive without modifying your file structure.

🎯 Improve Focus: Streamline your workflow to maintain momentum on your creative projects.

🤝 Enhance Collaboration: Share organized and easy-to-navigate files with your team, fostering better teamwork and understanding.

⏳ Save Time: Glide’s intuitive features reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, giving you more room for creativity.


Ready to Hive? Try it out now and watch your productivity soar. Let your designs flow effortlessly. Organize, focus, and present without distractions.
plugins.tagline: Hive: Organise. Categorise. Focus.

113080.name: Hive
113080.description:
Tired of endless swiping, cluttered frames, and struggling to stay focused?

Say hello to Hive, the ultimate Figma plugin designed to transform your design process. With its minimalist approach and powerful features, Hive ensures a smoother, more organized, and efficient workflow for designers and teams alike. Perfect for those working on complex projects with multiple screens and teams presenting designs or collaborating on organized workspaces.


Key Features

🗂 Create Categories: Group frames into organized categories for a streamlined workflow.

🔍 Zoom-In Functionality: Quickly focus on specific categories, making navigation seamless.

🎯 Smooth Screen Presentation: Eliminate the frustration of moving around messy frames while presenting. Hive ensures a clean, irritation-free presentation experience.

⚡ Simplified Workflow: Minimalist, easy-to-use interface that saves time and effort.

🔄 Quick Frame Switching: Easily switch between frames without excessive swiping, allowing for a faster and more efficient workflow as you move through different tasks.


Why This Plugin?

When working on large design files, scrolling endlessly, searching for frames, or jumping between screens during team presentations can be chaotic and jarring to the eye. Hive eliminates the frustration by organizing frames into clear categories and enabling zoom-in functionality. Whether you're working alone or presenting designs to your team, Hive keeps your workspace smooth, clean, and irritation-free.

🚀 Boost Productivity: Spend less time navigating and more time designing.

🗂️ Stay Organized: Keep your navigation intuitive without modifying your file structure.

🎯 Improve Focus: Streamline your workflow to maintain momentum on your creative projects.

🤝 Enhance Collaboration: Share organized and easy-to-navigate files with your team, fostering better teamwork and understanding.

⏳ Save Time: Glide’s intuitive features reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, giving you more room for creativity.


Ready to Hive? Try it out now and watch your productivity soar. Let your designs flow effortlessly. Organize, focus, and present without distractions.

plugins.name: skinnerplugin
plugins.description:
Bring your CSS themes to life effortlessly with Skinner. This plugin empowers designers to create, manage, and apply consistent styles across all elements of their Figma projects with ease. By simply providing a CSS theme, Skinner instantly generates paint styles for backgrounds, text, and accents, enabling a streamlined and cohesive design workflow.


With Skinner, you can:


Generate and update styles in seconds.

Maintain a consistent design aesthetic across your projects.

Easily switch between different color themes and accents for versatile design needs.

Whether you’re designing for web, mobile, or any digital interface, Skinner ensures that your styles are always organized, professional, and ready for use.


Simplify. Style. Create. With Skinner.

plugins.name: RTS CopyBookCreator
plugins.description:
The plugin pulls all texts from selected frames and creates a CSV-file. The CSV will have 4 columns to help you organize your copybook. These columns are: Name of the Frame, Name of the Group, Name of the Text-Style, Text. If you organize your designs accordingly, you'll get a neatly structured Copybook.


Important: The plugin uses semicolons as delimiter, so that Excel can show the CSV properly.
plugins.tagline: Pulls all texts from your figma designs and creates a csv file.

107835.name: RTS CopyBookCreator
107835.description:
The plugin pulls all texts from selected frames and creates a CSV-file. The CSV will have 4 columns to help you organize your copybook. These columns are: Name of the Frame, Name of the Group, Name of the Text-Style, Text. If you organize your designs accordingly, you'll get a neatly structured Copybook.


Important: The plugin uses semicolons as delimiter, so that Excel can show the CSV properly.
107835.tagline: Pulls all texts from your figma designs and creates a csv file.

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

124254.name: Swift Layer Exporter
124254.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.

plugins.name: Zero Me
plugins.description:
Zero Me: Center Your Starting Point


Start designing from anywhere on the canvas, and when you're ready, let Zero Me center your creations. Simply select your frames and objects, run the plugin, and Zero Me will position your designs at coordinates (0, 0), keeping your canvas clean and organized.


Zero Me is a small but mighty Figma plugin that simplifies the process of centering and aligning your designs. It's for designers who want to maintain a tidy workspace and ensure a consistent starting point for their projects.


Key Features:

1. Center Alignment: Zero Me sets the position of your selected frames and objects to coordinates (0, 0), providing a centered starting point for your designs.

2. Multiple Object Support: Select multiple frames and objects, and Zero Me will align them all to the center of the canvas.


Install Zero Me and experience the convenience of a centered starting point for your Figma designs.


Created by Taryn + Claude 3 Opus
plugins.tagline: Center you Frames, Objects, Sections, and Self 🧘

85268.description:

2. Multiple Object Support: Select multiple frames and objects, and Zero Me will align them all to the center of the canvas.


Install Zero Me and experience the convenience of a centered starting point for your Figma designs.


Created by Taryn + Claude 3 Opus
85268.tagline: Center you Frames, Objects, Sections, and Self 🧘

plugins.name: Mendly — Merge & Fix Broken Variables
plugins.description:
**Streamline your design system maintenance with powerful variable management tools.**


## Key Features


**🔄 Smart Variable Merging**

- Combine duplicate color variables into one

- Automatically updates all references throughout your design

- Preserves semantic variable relationships

- Optional renaming during merge process


**🔧 Broken Variable Detection & Repair**

- Scans current page for broken variable references

- Smart suggestions based on variable naming patterns

- Navigate between elements using the same broken variable

- Batch fix multiple variables at once


**⚡ Intelligent Analysis**

- Shows direct vs semantic variable usage

- Counts affected elements before merging

- Identifies variable dependencies

- Context-aware replacement suggestions


**🎯 Perfect For**

- Design system cleanup and maintenance

- Removing duplicate variables after design updates

- Fixing broken references after variable deletions

- Streamlining color variable organization


**💡 How It Works**

1. Select source variable (will be removed) and target variable (will remain)

2. Preview affected elements and usage statistics

3. Merge variables with one click - all references automatically update

4. Use the fix tool to repair any broken variable links


Save hours of manual work and keep your design system clean and organized!
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly merge duplicate variables and fix broken references in your design system.

plugins.name: Padding Check
plugins.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? This plugin solves this problem of yours where you can quickly identify the Figma frames with the said padding issues. The plugin has a very simple UI where we have info display section and 2 buttons. 1st button "Highlight frames" selects all problematic frames and brings them to your view (Shift+1) and the 2nd button "Mark frames" creates a red box around all the frames that have a padding issue. The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
plugins.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

134144.name: Padding Check
134144.description: Are developers always at your back since your paddings are always not multiples of 4? The good news is that this plugin works only for Auto layout frames and not for all frames thereby not giving you unwanted results. As a helper once the plugin is executed (either of the buttons used to find the frames with issues) The information section of the plugin UI displays the count of the frames with issues helping the user to quickly take account of the issue.
134144.tagline: Are all paddings in your Figma file multiples of 4? Use this plugin to quickly identify if not!

plugins.name: PRE: AI Design Review
plugins.description:
PRE helps designers and product teams understand how users will interact with their UI designs — before a single line of code is written.


🔹 Select any frame in Figma and click “Upload Selected Frame” to send it to PRE.

🔹 PRE will automatically generate a heatmap, predict click-through rates, and provide UX suggestions using AI.

🔹 You can modify the generated tags, draw additional clickable elements, or toggle the heatmap overlay on and off using the second button in the top bar.

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
plugins.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

138599.name: PRE: AI Design Review
138599.description:

🔹 Once you're happy with the predictions, you can download the heatmap and click data for further analysis or presentation.


Whether you're working on early wireframes or high-fidelity mocks, PRE helps you make design decisions backed by predictive user analytics — all from right inside Figma.


Powered by PRE
138599.tagline: Export any Figma frame and instantly generate heatmaps, CTR predictions and UX feedback with PRE.

plugins.name: Text Styles to Variables
plugins.description:
PLUGIN CRAFTED FOR REFOKUS


Plugin Documentation

This plugin extracts font-related properties from your local text styles and converts them into reusable variables. It automatically applies the following variables:

•Font size

•Font weight

•Font family


Additionally, the plugin documents—but does not apply—the following properties:

•Line height

•Letter spacing


This is due to a current Figma limitation: dynamic variables for these properties are not yet supported. As a workaround, these values are stored as string variables for documentation purposes only.


For example:

If the original line-height is 100%, the plugin will store it as a variable with:

variableName: 100%, variableValue: 1em (calculated as 100 ÷ 100 × 1em)


Naming Convention for text styles:


To ensure accurate detection and conversion, your text styles should follow this naming structure:

•Use the prefix title- followed by a number (e.g., title-1) for headings

•Use the prefix text- followed by a number (e.g., text-2) for paragraphs


You can also use suffixes to describe combo classes. For instance:

•text-2-buttonLabel


This will still be recognized as a text-2 style with additional contextual information.
plugins.tagline: By Fede Luna

135683.name: Text Styles to Variables
135683.description:
PLUGIN CRAFTED FOR REFOKUS


Plugin Documentation

This plugin extracts font-related properties from your local text styles and converts them into reusable variables. It automatically applies the following variables:

Additionally, the plugin documents—but does not apply—the following properties:

This is due to a current Figma limitation: dynamic variables for these properties are not yet supported. As a workaround, these values are stored as string variables for documentation purposes only.


For example:

variableName: 100%, variableValue: 1em (calculated as 100 ÷ 100 × 1em)


Naming Convention for text styles:


To ensure accurate detection and conversion, your text styles should follow this naming structure:

•Use the prefix text- followed by a number (e.g., text-2) for paragraphs

plugins.name: BANCONE
plugins.description: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools that simplify, optimize, and improve the quality of Human-Machine Interaction (HMI) design and development. Initially focused on the automotive sector, specifically software-defined vehicles, the platform is designed to expand to other industrial domains in the future. BANCONE transforms how automotive teams create and implement sophisticated cockpit interfaces, leveraging artificial intelligence to automate routine tasks, detect issues early, and generate innovative design solutions.
plugins.tagline: BANCONE is a Software-as-a-Service platform powered by an integrated suite of AI-driven tools

plugins.name: Text Filler with CSV
plugins.description:
You can populate components containing multiple text elements with strings from a CSV file.

Tab-separated values are also supported, allowing copy-paste directly from Google Spreadsheet.

Rows and columns are applied in layer order, and empty cells are skipped.


複数のテキストを含むコンポーネントに CSV から文字列を流し込むことができます。

タブ区切りにも対応し、Google Spreadsheet からのコピペも対応しています。

行や列は、レイヤー順に適用され、空のセルはスキップされます。


解説記事： https://note.com/feb19/n/n17ac26f980e0
plugins.tagline: Populate components with multiple text fields from CSV automatically. 複数テキストを持つコンポーネントに文字列を自動入力できます。

130705.description:

plugins.name: Set Gradient Style
plugins.description:
The plugin allows you to transfer the parameters of a new gradient to previously published styles, simplifying the process of manually transferring angles and breakpoints. This may be necessary if you need to update the current style, but doing it manually will cause.


  1. Select a Frame, Rectangle or Vector with a new gradient
  2. Write local style name which you want to update
  3. Press "Set style"
plugins.tagline: Transferring a gradient parameters to a previously published style

plugins.name: Fig Toolkit
plugins.description:
Fig Toolkit is your all-in-one Figma companion, focused on helping designers sort, align, and organise their workspace faster and more intuitively. With powerful sorting tools, renaming capabilities, and precise alignment options, you can bring structure and clarity to any design layout. For those managing text consistency, the toolkit also scans and identifies unstyled or mixed text layers, making it easy to apply or update text styles.


🔹 Easily sort and rename layers

🔹 Precisely align elements with adjustable spacing

🔹 Wrap layers into new sections with custom padding

🔹 Reorder layers directly in the layers panel

🔹 Detect mixed or unstyled fonts

🔹 View and fix text layers missing styles

🔹 Apply or update text styles quickly

🔹 Streamline your design workflow with ease
plugins.tagline: Sort, Align & Manage Styles in Figma Effortlessly

plugins.name: Component Boss (Beta)
plugins.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Your Design Workflow

121220.name: Component Boss (Beta)
121220.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!

114109.name: Psi Figma Plugin
114109.description:
Eliminate the hassle of searching for brand assets with the "Psi Figma Plugin". Instantly access Property Shop Investment LLC’s logos, colors, fonts, and more to streamline your design workflow.


Stay consistent and on-brand effortlessly with the "Psi Figma Plugin", crafted to centralize all your assets in one convenient place.


Key Features of the “ Psi Figma Plugin” :


  1. Import Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets directly into Figma.


  1. Access the latest logos, icons, colors, fonts, and design essentials with ease.


  1. Sync your Property Shop Investment LLC brand assets for fast and centralized access.



About Psi Figma Plugin :


The "Psi Figma Plugin" is the ultimate tool for managing Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets. It ensures Our brand stays consistent and accessible, empowering Our designs with the most up-to-date materials directly within Figma.


Have Questions or Feedback? Contact us at a.jarwan@psinv.net

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin requires access to external resources hosted on raw.githubusercontent.com and Bootstrap's CDN for styling.

114109.tagline: "Psi Figma Plugin: Our Brand, Seamlessly Streamlined."

plugins.name: CSS Custom Property to Figma
plugins.description:
1. Register CSS Color Custom Properties

• Simply copy CSS color custom properties and paste them into the input field.

• The plugin automatically parses and registers them as styles or variables.


2. Fast and Simple Conversion Flow

• Complete the flow with ease: paste your CSS code → Apply

• No complex setup required.
plugins.tagline: Converts CSS color custom properties into styles or variables

115262.tagline: Converts CSS color custom properties into styles or variables

plugins.name: cl-icon-extractor
plugins.description: The CL Icon Extractor plugin allows Figma users to quickly search for icons from the cl-icons library and extract them with ease. This tool is designed for designers and developers who want to streamline their workflow and save time by accessing a vast array of icons directly within Figma.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly search and extract icons with precision.

109581.name: cl-icon-extractor
109581.description: The CL Icon Extractor plugin allows Figma users to quickly search for icons from the cl-icons library and extract them with ease. This tool is designed for designers and developers who want to streamline their workflow and save time by accessing a vast array of icons directly within Figma.
109581.tagline: Effortlessly search and extract icons with precision.

plugins.name: Toggle Layer Visibility
plugins.description:
Purpose

You can hide/show layers based on their names.


How to use

Select a frame.

Enter the layer name pattern.

Click on “Hide Layers” button.

Done!


You can later show the layers again.


Version

1.0.0 Initial version
plugins.tagline: Hide/Show layers by text name pattern

110647.name: Toggle Layer Visibility
110647.description:
Purpose

You can hide/show layers based on their names.


How to use

Select a frame.

Enter the layer name pattern.

Click on “Hide Layers” button.

Done!


You can later show the layers again.


Version

1.0.0 Initial version
110647.release_notes:
Improved functionality for shapes.
New "Show all layers" button.
110647.tagline: Hide/Show layers by text name pattern

plugins.name: Wrighty
plugins.description:
Meet Wrighty – your go-to Figma plugin for instant, AI-powered content generation! Imagine filling all your screens with perfectly crafted text in seconds. Wrighty doesn’t just generate words; it adapts them. From landing pages to app flows, Wrighty intuitively matches your specified tone and context, creating unique, on-brand content for every screen you design.


Forget hours spent drafting and editing copy. With Wrighty, just a few clicks auto-generate clear, compelling text that resonates with your target audience. Need to rephrase content across multiple screens? No problem—Wrighty does it all, maintaining consistency and quality to let you focus on design.


Why Wrighty? It’s fast, smart, and seamless. Wrighty empowers you to scale your creative output, delivering screen-ready content that’s as polished as your visuals. Join thousands of Figma users who have already leveled up their workflow with Wrighty. Generate more, customize better, and design faster with Wrighty—the content engine that keeps up with your creativity!
plugins.tagline: AI-powered assistant for all UX writing needs.

plugins.name: Variables to CSS by Moon-Moon
plugins.description:
One-click solution to instantly export your local text styles and variables into CSS variables, streamlining your development process !


Organize text styles like this

  1. Desktop
  2. Mobile
  3. Text (for cross use and general styles)
plugins.tagline: Transform your local styles and variables into CSS variables !
